I see me some Yuugi and now I have to watch this Anime! [/bq]

"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a87b7a63687277073d0500#post_54a87b7a63687277073d0500
[bq="ParagonCommander"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a87a5f6368720754c50200#post_54a87a5f6368720754c50200
Wait, Touhou has an anime?
I thought it was just a game series.[/bq]
There's *THREE* fan animes:
"Fantasy Kaleidoscope Red Mist Incident Part 1":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ap5910bTGLA
"Fantasy Kaleidoscope Red Mist Incident Part 2":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEff2L_ry5k
"Fantasy Kaleidoscope Red Mist Incident Part 3":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6ffjK96FvkU

The Red Mist arc is damn good, but it's only a hour.  If you are any level of a anime freak, like damn good anime, like good animation and like distinct characters all with unique personalities I would heavily suggest anyone check it out.

topics.body:
Hey I got to ask, but in the event you're cornered by some drunk with a broken glass bottle, do you: 

A) Shove them when the opportunity arises then stomp em in the nuts

B) Try talk them down and hope to hell they're lucid enough to make sense of it all

C) Point and shout at something and then leg it as fast as you can

D) Offer to give them more beer and go on your merry way
